long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Session Saver is a browser extension that provides the functionality to save and reopen currently open tabs, as well as schedule regular backups.

Key Features:

Save and Restore Tabs: Save currently open tabs for later access and reopen them at your convenience.
Periodic Backups: Take regular backups of open tabs.
Save Recently Closed Tabs: Preserve recently closed tabs for restoration when needed.
